name: Steel Sybil Z-14
flavor_text:
"Everything I touch falls apart! I see the fragments on the floor!"

"Well, isn't that a good thing? You know, if you're a sword?"

frame.name: Adaptive Frame
frame.description:
[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy uppercut attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.

perks.description: Increased damage at the cost of sword ammo.
perks.name: Jagged Edge

perks.description: Sword Guard has maximized efficiency and high endurance, but low resistance.
perks.name: Enduring Guard

perks.description: Sword Kills boost movement speed and damage.
perks.name: Assassin's Blade
